attributes.action: make the online cricket game Battrick an Olympic sport in time for London 2012.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Battrick is far superior to almost every Olypmic event, and its inclusion in the events at London 2012 would drag the Games into the 21st century.  Bat-thletes would select their teams and tactics and the matches could be seen live on giant screens, and online around the world.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
